damage to the frontmost enemy twice.

VedalOrb.NAME: Vedal987
DESCRIPTION: #yPassive: At the start of your turn, upgrade #b%d cards in your draw pile. NL #yEvoke: Upgrade #b%d random cards in hand.

CerberOrb.NAME: Cerber
DESCRIPTION: #yPassive: At the end of your turn, gain #b%d #yVigor. NL #yEvoke: Gain #b%d #yVigor.

ShoomimiOrb.NAME: Shoomimi

EllieOrb.NAME: Ellie Minibot

BookieOrb.NAME: Bookie
DESCRIPTION: #yPassive: At the end of turn, randomly transfer either #b%d debuff from player to a monster OR  #b%d buff from a monster to the player.
NL #yEvoke: Randomly transfer either #b%d debuff from player to a monster OR  #b%d buff from a monster to the player.
